articles.title: Elon Musk's April Fool's Disney Tweet Triggers Hilarious Crypto Community Response - U.Today
articles.description: X boss has gotten crypto community rolling with his jesting April Fool's message
articles.content:
Elon Musk, Tesla and SpaceX CEO and owner of X, has stirred the cryptocurrency community with a message that is clearly an April Fools one.
Musk trolls Disney CEO

articles.title: OpenAI debuts voice cloning tool, but deems it too risky for public release - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: ChatGPT creator says Voice Engine can replicate a person’s voice based on a 15-second audio sample.
articles.content:
OpenAI has unveiled a tool for cloning peoples voices but is holding back on its public release due to concerns about possible misuse in a key election year.

articles.title: Huge AI funding leads to hype and 'grifting', warns DeepMind's Demis Hassabis - Financial Times
